mapper.insert: insert into meeting (meetingname, roomid, reservationistid, numberofparticipants, starttime, endtime, reservationtime, canceledtime, description, status) values (#{meetingname},#{roomid},#{reservationistid},#{numberofparticipants},#{starttime},#{endtime},#{reservationtime},#{canceledtime},#{description},1)
mapper.select: SELECT meetingname, numberofparticipants, starttime, endtime, description FROM meeting WHERE meetingid = #{meetingid}

SELECT employee.employeename, employee.phone, employee.email FROM meeting, meetingparticipants, employee WHERE meeting.meetingid = #{meetingid} AND meeting.meetingid = meetingparticipants.meetingid AND meetingparticipants.employeeid = employee.employeeid

SELECT mt.meetingid, mt.roomname, mt.meetingname, mt.starttime, mt.endtime, mt.reservationtime, e.employeename FROM ( SELECT meeting.meetingid AS meetingid, meetingroom.roomname AS roomname, meeting.meetingname AS meetingname, meeting.starttime AS starttime, meeting.endtime AS endtime, meeting.reservationtime as reservationtime, employee.employeeid AS employeeid, meeting.roomid AS roomid, meetingroom.roomid AS mrroomid, meetingparticipants.meetingid AS mpmeetingid, meetingparticipants.employeeid AS mpemployeeid FROM meeting, meetingroom, meetingparticipants, employee ) AS mt, ( SELECT employee.employeename AS employeename, meeting.meetingid AS meetingid FROM meeting, employee WHERE meeting.reservationistid = employee.employeeid ) AS e WHERE mt.employeeid = #{employeeid} AND mt.roomid = mt.mrroomid AND mt.meetingid = mt.mpmeetingid AND mpemployeeid = employeeid AND e.meetingid = mt.meetingid limit #{page}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT meeting.meetingid AS meetingid, meetingroom.roomname AS roomname, meeting.meetingname AS meetingname, meeting.starttime AS starttime, meeting.endtime AS endtime, meeting.reservationtime as reservationtime, employee.employeeid AS employeeid, meeting.roomid AS roomid, meetingroom.roomid AS mrroomid, meetingparticipants.meetingid AS mpmeetingid, meetingparticipants.employeeid AS mpemployeeid FROM meeting, meetingroom, meetingparticipants, employee ) AS mt, ( SELECT employee.employeename AS employeename, meeting.meetingid AS meetingid FROM meeting, employee WHERE meeting.reservationistid = employee.employeeid ) AS e WHERE mt.employeeid = #{employeeid} AND mt.roomid = mt.mrroomid AND mt.meetingid = mt.mpmeetingid AND mpemployeeid = employeeid AND e.meetingid = mt.meetingid

SELECT meeting.meetingid, meetingroom.roomname, meeting.meetingname, meeting.starttime, meeting.endtime, meeting.reservationtime FROM meeting, meetingroom WHERE meeting.reservationistid = #{employeeid} AND meeting.roomid = meetingroom.roomid
